quote: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other? – George Eliot
fact: To escape the grip of a crocodile`s jaws, push your thumbs into its eyeballs - it will let you go instantly.
joke:
Never Trust Someone With Graph Paper...

They're always plotting something.
